snippet: Louis C. K., who writes, produces, acts in and often edits “Louie,” said on Tuesday that he will take a break from the show. Its fourth season will likely debut in spring 2014.
abstract: Louis C. K., who writes, produces, acts in and often edits “Louie,” said on Tuesday that he will take a break from the show. Its fourth season will likely debut in spring 2014.

headline.main: Louis C. K. to Take Hiatus From FX Series 'Louie'
headline.print_headline: Louis C. K. Taking a Hiatus From His FX Series
